it.polimi.se2018.model.schema

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.schema.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates DiceFaces and holds them. It also checks that not more than a certain number of dice is created for each color.
    Since:
    09/05/2018
    Author:
    Francesco Sgherzi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.EnumMap<GameColor,java.lang.Integer> counter 
      private int dicesDrawn 
      private java.util.Random random 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiceBag() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiceFace drawDice()
      Draws a dice checking that the number of dices drawn per color is less than `Settings.MAX_DICE_PER_COLOR` and the number of total drawn dices is less than `Settings.MAX_DICE_PER_COLOR * GameColor.values().length`
      void putBackDice(DiceFace diceFace)
      Puts back a dice, checking that a dice of that color has ever been drawn, or if any dice has ever been drawn.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        private java.util.Random random

        private int dicesDrawn

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiceBag

        public DiceBag()

    • Method Detail

      • drawDice

        public DiceFace drawDice()
        Draws a dice checking that the number of dices drawn per color is less than `Settings.MAX_DICE_PER_COLOR` and the number of total drawn dices is less than `Settings.MAX_DICE_PER_COLOR * GameColor.values().length`
        Returns:
        A new DiceFace, according to internal checks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the number of dices drawn is greater than 90.

      • putBackDice

        public void putBackDice(DiceFace diceFace)
        Puts back a dice, checking that a dice of that color has ever been drawn, or if any dice has ever been drawn.
        Parameters:
        diceFace - The DiceFace to be put back.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the number of dices drawn is less than 0.
